pull.title: Add script test to prove that OP_0 evaluates as the empty vector.
pull.body: Add script test to prove that OP_0 evaluates as the empty vector, rather than [0].

events.body: Also see https://github.com/bitcoinj/bitcoinj/pull/27 for the bitcoinj side of tests and a bit of history why this is important.

events.message: Add script test to prove that OP_0 evaluates as the empty vector, rather than [0].

events.body:
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/ffd082a6a36bf0b85078be8400b8eda3630b34b3 for binaries and test log.
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/current/
Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.
Anything besides 2 ACKs and the mercy of pull tester needed to get this merged? I'm not familiar with the process.
@schildbach I thought I merged it, it seems something went wrong and it ended up in a feature branch instead.
